ufc.title: Master's Student and Bachelor in Computer Science
ufc.text: I graduated from the Federal University of Ceará (UFC), where I pursued my undergraduate studies from March 2020 to September 2024. I began my master’s degree in March 2025.

backend.title: Back-End Development
backend.text: I develop automations and REST APIs. I also have experience with deploying applications.

frontend.title: Front-End Development
frontend.text: I am skilled in creating responsive websites, both for user-facing interfaces and data management.

database.title: Database Management
database.text: I have experience with modeling and working with both relational and non-relational databases.

texts.diagnostic-application: Contributed to the development of a hardware diagnostic application for IoT devices using C++.
texts.unif-sdk: Worked on unifying the SDKs of two hardware diagnostic applications in C++ across different platforms, establishing optimized architectural standards and reducing code inconsistencies.
texts.front-end: Developed front-end features using React, TypeScript, Material UI, and Electron, modernizing the interface and improving performance and maintainability.
texts.documentation: Authored technical documentation in English using LaTeX, facilitating team understanding and reducing onboarding time for new members.
texts.scrum: Collaborated with the team using Scrum practices for task organization and delivery.
texts.version-control: Used Git in collaborative workflows for version control, ensuring traceability and continuous integration across development branches.

texts.web-pages: Implemented web pages using Svelte with TypeScript and Vite, including forms, routes, and filtered item listings, managing state and maintaining best practices.
texts.proto: Designed a high-fidelity functional prototype in Figma, applying component creation practices and design variables.
texts.form: Participated in the planning and structuring of data collection forms.

texts.rest-api: Developed REST APIs utilizing Python (FastAPI), TypeScript (Node.js), and containerized the applications with Docker.
texts.gantt: Implemented an internal system for tracking team activities in GitLab, periodically collecting information and displaying it in a Gantt chart format using TypeScript with Node.js and Redis.
texts.feedback: Developed an internal employee evaluation application using Python, FastAPI, MongoDB, and RSA/SHA encryption, with containerization via Docker. I also contributed to the front-end by implementing charts, forms, and data editing features using Svelte, Mantine, and TypeScript
texts.automations: Automated several tasks using Python and converted them into Windows executables with PyInstaller, replacing manual manipulation of large spreadsheets.
texts.powerbi: Developed a custom Python-based system to track PowerBI metrics, enabling instant alerts via Microsoft Teams
texts.management: Created an internal data management system using Python (FastAPI) and MySQL, with a React front-end, allowing users to view and edit data in a spreadsheet-like format.
texts.unit-test: Performed unit testing on systems, including APIs and other Python-based applications, as well as applications built with TypeScript
texts.logs: Monitored production application logs using Kibana and ElasticSearch.
texts.s3: Contributed to the development of a system that managed file allocation on S3.
texts.docs: Authored technical documentation in English for various internal libraries and systems.

texts.classes: Developed educational materials and taught programming to children aged 7 to 17 using Snap! and Python. Incorporated Minecraft as a playful learning tool to make the educational process more engaging and accessible.
texts.sheets: Automated and optimized spreadsheet processing, significantly reducing manual effort and improving efficiency.
texts.meetings: Regularly participated in meetings conducted entirely in English with company leadership and also assisted in translating platforms and materials.
texts.courses: Managed customer service and assisted with course sales, providing support and guidance to enhance the customer experience.

texts.dev: Developed custom WordPress themes for business websites and academic projects using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, PHP, and JavaScript, creating responsive interfaces optimized for enhanced user experience.

propor.title: Role-Playing Game Animation Generator
propor.text: System for generating RPG game animations from sentence processing in Portuguese, using Python with the SpaCy library and the RPG Maker MV engine. This project was selected for an international Portuguese language processing conference.

mel.title: Mel's Journey
mel.text: A narrative game designed to teach financial mathematics to high school students, focusing on topics such as percentages, simple interest, and compound interest. The game was developed using RPG Maker MV and JavaScript. It underwent student evaluation and received outstanding feedback.

caronei.title: Caronei
caronei.text: Carpool app for the university campus using React Native for the frontend and JavaScript with Express.js for the back-end, with PostgreSQL as the database. The project includes geolocation and route calculation using graph algorithms

climasync.title: ClimaSync
climasync.text: weather-based IoT device management system using TypeScript with Node.js for the back-end, integrating the Tuya system API and a weather update system, with PostgreSQL as the database and Kotlin for the front-end.

raw.title: .raw Mode
raw.text: This is a puzzle-platformer game developed with PhaserJS for a game jam held on the Itch.io platform. The project stood out among the other participants and won first place in the Innovation category of the competition.

cg.title: Game with WebGL
cg.text: Inspired by the hit Subway Surfers, the game challenges the player to dodge trains while collecting coins to increase their total score. Developed with WebGL and JavaScript, the project is complemented by a website built with Bootstrap.
